definitions.definition: In the International System of Units , the derived unit of solid angle ; the solid angle subtended at the centre of a sphere of radius r by a portion of the surface of the sphere that has area r . Symbol: sr

main_definition: ( geometry ) In the International System of Units , the derived unit of solid angle ; the solid angle subtended at the centre of a sphere of radius r by a portion of the surface of the sphere that has area r . Symbol: sr
